title: Average ticket price Chicago Blackhawks ( NHL ) 2014/15
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average ticket price in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2005/06 to 2006/07, gradually increasing from 2006/07 to 2009/10, roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2011/12, and lastly slightly increasing from 2011/12 to 2014/15.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006/07 and 2007/08.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 78.8 was reported at Year 2014/15
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 34.88 was reported at Year 2005/06, and 2006/07
